biotools.summary: Clinical Variant Annotation Pipeline (ClinVAP) creates a genetic report of somatic mutations from a variant call format (VCF) file. Please refer this document for implementation of the pipeline. Documentation of the pipeline is available at Wiki page.

bioschemas.name: ClinVAP
